scripts.deploy: graph deploy --product hosted-service --ac --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ ArtBlocks/art-blocks
scripts.deploy-ropsten-dev: yarn prepare:ropsten-dev && graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ ArtBlocks/art-blocks-dev
scripts.deploy-ropsten-staging: yarn prepare:ropsten-staging && graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ ArtBlocks/art-blocks-artist-staging
